You can detect even very slight movements nearby.

Prerequisites: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.rX5rK6UWAIOeeipl.JournalEntryPage.p0o9tmWtKZ0qy8DI#darkvision]{darkvision} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.rX5rK6UWAIOeeipl.JournalEntryPage.p0o9tmWtKZ0qy8DI#low-light-vision]{low-light vision}

Benefit: Youâ€™ve enhanced your senses beyond the ability to see your surroundings. You gain @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.rX5rK6UWAIOeeipl.JournalEntryPage.p0o9tmWtKZ0qy8DI#blindsense]{blindsense} (vibration) 15 feet. If you have the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.Item.I8gAxrjGCnWoAYk2]{draconic vision} species trait, you instead gain blindsense (vibration) 30 feet.
